&#3920;&#3921;: [1144] gang de'i skor dang/ phyogs/ ... las don 'de'i thad/ ... de'i rang bzhin thad kyi bshad srol mi 'dra ba mang po 'dug  ... gang sa ci thad/ ... gang ci'i thad/ ...
about, with regard to, on, aspect, respect, side, aside, in one direction, entire, whole, untouched, about, concerning, by means of

1) * concerning, about, by means of; 2) aspect, respect, side; 3) the direction straight forward, whole, all than a piece of cloth. 1) [gen + --] concerning, about, by means of; 2) aspect, respect, side; 3) the direction straight forward, whole, all than a piece of cloth [gang de'i skor dang, phyogs.Las don 'de'i thad.De'i rang bzhin thad kyi bshad srol mi 'dra ba mang po 'dug ...Gang sa ci thad.Gang ci'i thad]
